definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Multi-millionaire Coleen is due to give birth any day.
sentences.chinese: 百万富翁科林哪天肯定会生小孩。
科林斯便渐渐取代了玫瑰花盆。

sentences.english: Well, Corin and I were twins.
sentences.chinese: 哦，原来科林和我是孪生兄弟。

sentences.english: She refused to promote Colin above the low rank of "legal adviser".
sentences.chinese: 她拒绝把科林由“法律顾问”这一低级别往上提。

sentences.english: However, the president of Corinthians, Andres Sanches, announced that such rumors are false.
sentences.chinese: 但是科林斯式俱乐部主席宣布这纯属谣言。

sentences.english: The 5th century BC Doric Temple of Apollo at the site of Ancient Corinth.
sentences.chinese: 公元前5世纪多利安寺在古代科林斯网站阿波罗。

sentences.english: Turkish military forces quickly seized several strategic cities and towns, and then brutally entered Corinth.
sentences.chinese: 土军快速攻克了数个战略重镇，随后进入了科林斯。

sentences.english: They settled with Colin at the end of the evening.
sentences.chinese: 晚上聚会结束的时候他们和科林结清了账。

sentences.english: The cuts on Colin's head could only have been made by head-butts.
sentences.chinese: 科林头上的那些伤口只能是用头撞击时造成的。

sentences.english: Of course, the Romans didn't care then how much I charged you, the people of Corinth in its area.
sentences.chinese: 当然，罗马人并不在乎我收了，科林斯人民多少税。

sentences.english: Colin opened the will, and began to read it out in a singsong voice.
sentences.chinese: 科林打开遗嘱，开始用一种节奏单调的语气念起来。

sentences.english: It was Grantaire who had discovered Corinthe.
sentences.chinese: 发现科林斯的是格朗泰尔。

sentences.english: And, in common with many of my friend's husbands, Colin regularly complains that this just isn't enough.
sentences.chinese: 跟我很多闺蜜的老公一样，科林也常常对此牢骚满腹。

sentences.english: He called the Theban and Corinthian shepherds to prove the truth.
sentences.chinese: 他叫来底比斯的和科林斯族牧羊人来证明这个事实。

sentences.english: This house is located just outside Santiago, in the rural area of the Colina Valley.
sentences.chinese: 该住宅位于智利首都圣地亚哥郊区科林山谷区。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
